member.name: DISPLAYCONFIG_VIDEO_OUTPUT_TECHNOLOGY
member.summary: The DISPLAYCONFIG_VIDEO_OUTPUT_TECHNOLOGY enumeration specifies the target's connector type.

member.name: DISPLAYCONFIG_VIDEO_OUTPUT_TECHNOLOGY.DISPLAYCONFIG_OUTPUT_TECHNOLOGY_OTHER
member.summary: Indicates a connector that is not one of the types that is indicated by the following enumerators in this enumeration.

member.name: DISPLAYCONFIG_VIDEO_OUTPUT_TECHNOLOGY.DISPLAYCONFIG_OUTPUT_TECHNOLOGY_COMPOSITE_VIDEO
member.summary: Indicates a composite video connector group.

member.name: DISPLAYCONFIG_VIDEO_OUTPUT_TECHNOLOGY.DISPLAYCONFIG_OUTPUT_TECHNOLOGY_COMPONENT_VIDEO
member.summary: Indicates a component video connector group.

member.name: DISPLAYCONFIG_VIDEO_OUTPUT_TECHNOLOGY.DISPLAYCONFIG_OUTPUT_TECHNOLOGY_DVI
member.summary: Indicates a Digital Video Interface (DVI) connector.

member.name: DISPLAYCONFIG_VIDEO_OUTPUT_TECHNOLOGY.DISPLAYCONFIG_OUTPUT_TECHNOLOGY_HDMI
member.summary: Indicates a High-Definition Multimedia Interface (HDMI) connector.

member.name: DISPLAYCONFIG_VIDEO_OUTPUT_TECHNOLOGY.DISPLAYCONFIG_OUTPUT_TECHNOLOGY_LVDS
member.summary: Indicates a Low Voltage Differential Swing (LVDS) connector.

member.name: DISPLAYCONFIG_VIDEO_OUTPUT_TECHNOLOGY.DISPLAYCONFIG_OUTPUT_TECHNOLOGY_DISPLAYPORT_EXTERNAL
member.summary: Indicates an external display port, which is a display port that connects externally to a display device.

member.name: DISPLAYCONFIG_VIDEO_OUTPUT_TECHNOLOGY.DISPLAYCONFIG_OUTPUT_TECHNOLOGY_DISPLAYPORT_EMBEDDED
member.summary: Indicates an embedded display port that connects internally to a display device.

member.name: DISPLAYCONFIG_VIDEO_OUTPUT_TECHNOLOGY.DISPLAYCONFIG_OUTPUT_TECHNOLOGY_UDI_EXTERNAL
member.summary: Indicates an external Unified Display Interface (UDI), which is a UDI that connects externally to a display device.

member.name: DISPLAYCONFIG_VIDEO_OUTPUT_TECHNOLOGY.DISPLAYCONFIG_OUTPUT_TECHNOLOGY_UDI_EMBEDDED
member.summary: Indicates an embedded UDI that connects internally to a display device.

member.name: DISPLAYCONFIG_VIDEO_OUTPUT_TECHNOLOGY.DISPLAYCONFIG_OUTPUT_TECHNOLOGY_SDTVDONGLE
member.summary: Indicates a dongle cable that supports standard definition television (SDTV).

summary.para: Indicates that the VidPN target is a Miracast wireless display device.

member.name: DISPLAYCONFIG_VIDEO_OUTPUT_TECHNOLOGY.DISPLAYCONFIG_OUTPUT_TECHNOLOGY_INTERNAL
member.summary: Indicates that the video output device connects internally to a display device (for example, the internal connection in a laptop computer).

member.name: DISPLAYCONFIG_VIDEO_OUTPUT_TECHNOLOGY.DISPLAYCONFIG_OUTPUT_TECHNOLOGY_FORCE_UINT32
member.summary: Forces this enumeration to compile to 32 bits in size. Without this value, some compilers would allow this enumeration to compile to a size other than 32 bits. You should not use this value.
